page.title: 13Steyning Clubs
page.content: Today the variety of clubs is greater than it has ever been.Many people enjoy the excitement so the clubs have to enlarge their membership.There is a{tennis }club,a{football}club, a {drama }club,{ballet, walking, {gymnastics}and{short tennis}clubs. Certainly a wide variety to choose from!{Tennis,}is one of the more popular sports. Some people enjoy the game of{cricket.}The Steyning school has a{cricket}team which often play against other schools.Occasionally,the Sussex County holds a {walking race which everyone can take part in.Quite a lot of people go to the{drama}club. Here they learn how to act, dance and sing.They often produce plays and everyone is welcome.The clubs we have mentioned,are not only for kids,adults are welcome as well.These clubs are enjoyed by everyone.
